Significance: An ID that represnet a registred customer in the platform/shop within the test set.
An unique id for each product that bought by the customer
Sex of the registered customer (M for Male; F for Female)
Category of the city whether it was A, B or C
The number of years stay in current city.
Martial Status of customer whether 0 is single and 1 is married
Product may belongs to other category also (Masked)
